attributes.action: Please start a Parliamentary inquiry into lobbying and cronyism.
attributes.additional_details: The Conservative party just blocked a motion to look into it transparently. What have they got to hide ? Why have their MPs been told to vote against the motion for an inquiry ?
attributes.background: Start a detailed, open, honest and transparent inquiry into lobbying and cronyism. What has actually happened with Greensill ?

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Public Administration and Constitutional Affairs Committee has launched an inquiry into the effectiveness of rules to prevent conflicts of interest and regulation of access by current and former politicians and officials. You can find out more about this inquiry here: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/1192/propriety-of-governance-in-light-of-greensill/
